function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Ineffective use of masks and lack of knowledge on mask usage","Impact":"Increased risk of infection spread","Mitigation":"Education on proper mask usage, awareness campaigns","Technologies":"Online tutorials, educational videos","People":"General public","Owner":"Health authorities, government"},{"Description":"Failure to adhere to social distancing and isolation measures","Impact":"Increased risk of infection spread","Mitigation":"Enforcement of regulations, public awareness campaigns","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, monitoring systems","People":"General public","Owner":"Government, law enforcement agencies"},{"Description":"Limited control over infection spread despite combined efforts","Impact":"Continued spread of the infection","Mitigation":"Enhanced testing and healthcare treatment, strict governance","Technologies":"Rapid testing kits, telemedicine, surveillance systems","People":"General public, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Healthcare system, government"}]}
